text: 5.21 Ais 53.6-12, Jon 8.46, Lom 5.19, 1 Ko 1.30, Gal 3.13, Plp 3.9, Hib 4.14-15, 1 Pi 2.22-24, 1 Jo 3.5 Klays ne tap si tap tɨmel olap ma gak. God pen, binɨb kɨli Klays ayɨp jɨmñɨl mɨdel kɨlop gen, binɨb suŋtep yad yenɨgel agɨl, gos anɨb ak nɨgup. Anɨb ak tek tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak, okok mɨdupsek dɨ jɨmñɨl Klays nop lek, Klays ne bɨ tap si tap tɨmel gup ak nep yek.
